articles.description: Elliott Page's character on "Umbrella Academy" will mimic real life.

articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.title: Obi-Wan Kenobi's premiere will be two days late, but you'll get two episodes at once - The Verge
articles.description: The Obi-Wan Kenobi Disney Plus series will now debut on Friday, May 27th, two days later than previously announced. There will be two episodes of the Star Wars spinoff available to watch on the premiere date instead of just one.
articles.content:
The show now debuts on May 27th
If you buy something from a Verge link, Vox Media may earn a commission. See our ethics statement.

articles.author: Jessica Summers
articles.title: Alopecia influencer slams Hollywood after the alopecia community gets online abuse - Daily Mail
articles.description: Procurement administrator Chloe Sheehan, 29,  from Cork, Ireland, began an online support group for people who have alopecia after she began losing her own hair in 2017.
articles.content:
An influencer who has lost 80 per cent of her hair in five years has claimed the alopecia community is facing backlash online following Will Smith's explosive Oscars scandal.
